results.content:
This course was a complete waste of my time
I spent days working on this and the professor is no where to be found. I realize this is a $10 course.. I get it..  but if courses are not going to be "Marked" obsolete after some time.. then it will be a waste of time for anyone who takes them. I guess that is the risk you take and I learnt the hard way. 
be careful with section 4 lecture 14.. you will find plenty of different code that was not even there to begin with in the previous section.. from there on is a total fall from the sky... you then will realize you wasted your time because there will be many errors thrown by php included deprecated stuff no longer used.. and the professor is no where to be found.. 
I will ask for a refund..
do not buy this course because you won't be able to finish it.

results.content:
Not a great course the tutor just wants you to follow along parrot fashion and you are not learning anything just copying him typing.

He lacks any real passion for the subject and at a time seems bored even doing videos. Audio is not great and you will have to pause a lot.

Avoid this one there are far better out there.
